> To be more precise it is not just those labels but everything in the
> junit.swingui.CounterPanel() class that is obscuring any dropped down menu.
> It appears to be some sort of Z-order repaint problem but I'm not
> sophisticated enough in the ways of Java UI classes to figure this out in a
> timely manner.
> 
> Any help would be greatly appreciated.

The CounterPanel must extend JPanel and not Panel.  This is fixed in the 
cvs version.

-Vladimir
